short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dom Stats: A handy tool to explore and analyze website DOM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dom Stats is a handy tool that displays the live count of DOM elements on any webpage you visit. It also enables you to toggle a helpful overlay for inspecting the page structure with ease.
